Interface PortableViewViewer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable, PortableViewSwingComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPortableViewViewer

    public interface PortableViewViewer
extends PortableViewSwingComponent, Disposable
    Interface of swing component that can show the cartography of a PortableView
